feature: Repository Pulse Dashboard - Phase 2 Metrics Calculation Engine
workflow_rationale: This is a new feature implementation adding 7 metric calculators to enable trend analysis for repositories. It requires creating new modules following established patterns with comprehensive unit testing.

phases.name: Directory Setup & Constants
phases.description: Create PulseDashboard directory structure and constants file with thresholds

subtasks.description: Create PulseDashboard directory and constants.js with thresholds, status labels, and default values
subtasks.notes: Created PulseDashboard directory and constants.js with all thresholds, status labels, and default values. Module exports 14 constants objects successfully verified.

phases.name: Utility Functions
phases.description: Create shared utility functions for calculations (average, daysSince, daysBetween, etc.)

subtasks.description: Create PulseCalculator.js with utility functions: average(), daysSince(), daysBetween(), getTrendDirection(), getMetricStatus(), getDefaultMetric()

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { console.log('getTrendDirection:', typeof m.getTrendDirection); console.log('getMetricStatus:', typeof m.getMetricStatus); process.exit(0); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"

subtasks.notes: Created PulseCalculator.js with 10 utility functions: average(), daysSince(), daysBetween(), getTrendDirection(), getMetricStatus(), getDefaultMetric(), clamp(), percentageChange(), safeParseDate(), emptySparkline(). All functions include JSDoc documentation and handle edge cases gracefully. Verified all exports working correctly.

phases.name: Core Metric Calculators (Group 1)
phases.description: Implement Velocity Score, Community Momentum, and Issue Temperature calculators

subtasks.description: Implement calculateVelocityScore(participation) - Compare last 4 weeks vs previous 12 weeks, generate sparkline data

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const r = m.calculateVelocityScore({all: Array(16).fill(5)}); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.status ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns MetricResult object with value, trend, direction, status, sparklineData, label

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateVelocityScore(participation) - Compares last 4 weeks vs previous 12 weeks commit activity. Returns MetricResult with value, trend, direction, sparklineData, status, and label. Handles edge cases: null data, empty arrays, short history. All 283 tests passing.

subtasks.description: Implement calculateCommunityMomentum(repo, events) - Star/fork growth rate with approximate sparkline

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const repo = {stargazers_count: 1000, forks_count: 100, created_at: '2020-01-01'}; const r = m.calculateCommunityMomentum(repo, []); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.status ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns MetricResult with star count and growth trend

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateCommunityMomentum(repo, events) - Calculates star/fork growth rate with approximate sparkline. Returns MetricResult with value (stars), trend, direction, sparklineData, status, and label. Handles edge cases: null repo, zero stars, missing events. Added helper function generateApproximateSparkline(). All 283 tests passing.

subtasks.description: Implement calculateIssueTemperature(issues) - Open vs close rate with Hot/Warm/Cool classification

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const r = m.calculateIssueTemperature([]); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.temperature !== undefined ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateIssueTemperature function with Hot/Warm/Cool/Critical classification based on close rate thresholds. Includes response time analysis, trend calculation, sparkline generation, and comprehensive metadata. Verification passed, all 283 tests passing.

phases.name: Advanced Metric Calculators (Group 2)
phases.description: Implement PR Health, Bus Factor, and Freshness Index calculators

subtasks.description: Implement calculatePRHealth(pullRequests) - Merge rate, time-to-merge, funnel data

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const r = m.calculatePRHealth([]); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.funnel !== undefined ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns MetricResult with merge rate and funnel data

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculatePRHealth(pullRequests) with merge rate, time-to-merge, and funnel data. All 283 tests pass. Committed as d9cf8c4.

subtasks.description: Implement calculateBusFactor(contributors) - Contributor concentration risk (1-10 scale)

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const r = m.calculateBusFactor([{total: 100, author: {login: 'dev'}}]); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.riskLevel !== undefined ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns MetricResult with bus factor value and risk level

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateBusFactor(contributors) - analyzes contributor concentration risk on 1-10 scale. Algorithm considers: contributors needed for 80% of commits, top contributor concentration, number of significant contributors. Includes risk levels (healthy/moderate/high/critical) and sparkline showing contribution distribution. All 283 tests pass.

subtasks.description: Implement calculateFreshnessIndex(repo, releases) - Days since push, last release, freshness score

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const repo = {updated_at: new Date().toISOString(), pushed_at: new Date().toISOString()}; const r = m.calculateFreshnessIndex(repo, []); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.freshness !== undefined ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns MetricResult with freshness classification and days since push

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateFreshnessIndex(repo, releases) function. Calculates days since push, last release, and freshness score using weighted scoring (push 60%, release 25%, update 15%). Returns MetricResult with freshness classification. All 283 tests pass.

phases.name: Overall Pulse Aggregator
phases.description: Implement calculateOverallPulse and calculateAllMetrics wrapper functions

subtasks.description: Implement calculateOverallPulse(metrics) - Aggregate all 6 metrics into single status, pulse speed, concerns count

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const metrics = {velocity: {status: 'stable'}, momentum: {status: 'stable'}, issues: {status: 'stable'}, prs: {status: 'stable'}, busFactor: {status: 'stable'}, freshness: {status: 'stable'}}; const r = m.calculateOverallPulse(metrics); console.log(JSON.stringify(r)); process.exit(r.status !== undefined ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns overall status, score, pulseSpeed, concerns count

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateOverallPulse(metrics) that aggregates all 6 metrics into single status, calculates weighted score, pulse speed, and concerns count. All 283 tests pass. Verification successful.

subtasks.description: Implement calculateAllMetrics(pulseData) - Wrapper that calls all calculators and returns complete metrics object

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/PulseCalculator.js').then(m => { const data = {repo: {stargazers_count: 100, forks_count: 10, created_at: '2020-01-01', updated_at: new Date().toISOString(), pushed_at: new Date().toISOString()}}; const r = m.calculateAllMetrics(data); console.log(Object.keys(r)); process.exit(r.metrics && r.overall ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Returns object with metrics (6) and overall pulse

subtasks.notes: Implemented calculateAllMetrics(pulseData) wrapper function that calls all 6 metric calculators and returns complete metrics object with metrics (6) and overall pulse. Verification passed. All 283 tests pass.

phases.name: Public API & Exports
phases.description: Create index.js with public exports for the PulseDashboard module

subtasks.description: Create index.js exporting all public functions: calculateAllMetrics, individual calculators, utility functions

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/index.js').then(m => { console.log('Exports:', Object.keys(m).join(', ')); process.exit(m.calculateAllMetrics ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
verification.expected: Module exports calculateAllMetrics and individual calculators

subtasks.notes: Created index.js exporting 32 public items: calculateAllMetrics, 7 individual calculators, 10 utility functions, and 14 constants. Verification passed - all exports accessible.

phases.name: Unit Tests
phases.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all calculators with edge case coverage

subtasks.description: Create PulseDashboard.test.js with utility function tests and mock data factories
subtasks.notes:
Created PulseDashboard.test.js with 166 tests including:
- Mock data factories for repos, participation, issues, PRs, contributors, events, releases
- Utility function tests: average, daysSince, daysBetween, getTrendDirection, getMetricStatus, getDefaultMetric, clamp, percentageChange, safeParseDate, emptySparkline
- Calculator tests for all 7 metric calculators
- Edge case tests for null inputs, empty arrays, invalid dates
- MetricResult shape validation tests
Total tests: 449 (283 original + 166 new)

subtasks.description: Add tests for calculateVelocityScore - empty data, increasing activity, declining activity
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive tests for calculateVelocityScore covering empty data, increasing activity, declining activity, stable activity, and MetricResult shape validation. Expanded from ~15 to ~35 velocity tests with nested describe blocks following HealthScore.test.js patterns. All 471 tests pass.

subtasks.description: Add tests for calculateCommunityMomentum, calculateIssueTemperature, calculatePRHealth

verification.expected: Momentum, temperature, PR health tests pass

subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive tests for calculateCommunityMomentum (8 describe blocks with ~35 tests), calculateIssueTemperature (10 describe blocks with ~40 tests), and calculatePRHealth (11 describe blocks with ~45 tests). All 286 tests in PulseDashboard.test.js pass.

subtasks.description: Add tests for calculateBusFactor, calculateFreshnessIndex, calculateOverallPulse

verification.expected: Bus factor, freshness, overall pulse tests pass

subtasks.notes: Added 63 comprehensive tests for calculateBusFactor, calculateFreshnessIndex, and calculateOverallPulse following HealthScore.test.js patterns. Tests cover risk levels, thresholds, status mapping, score calculation, label generation, sparkline data, metric weights, direction calculation, concern levels, pulse speed animation, and breakdown objects. Total test count increased from 286 to 349.

subtasks.description: Add edge case tests: null data, partial data, boundary values, and integration test for calculateAllMetrics
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive edge case tests including: null/undefined data handling for all calculators, partial data handling tests, boundary value tests for STATUS_THRESHOLDS and TREND_THRESHOLDS, clamp and percentageChange boundary tests, integration tests for calculateAllMetrics with full data flow, edge case combinations (new repo, archived, viral, single contributor), and graceful degradation tests. All 410 tests passing.

phases.name: Final Verification
phases.description: Run full test suite and verify no regressions

subtasks.description: Run full test suite (npm test) and verify 283+ existing tests plus new PulseDashboard tests pass
subtasks.notes: All 693 tests pass (9 test files). PulseDashboard tests: 410, existing tests preserved. Well above the 290+ expected target.

subtasks.description: Verify module can be imported and used - simulate integration with detail.js

verification.command: node -e "import('./src/js/components/PulseDashboard/index.js').then(m => { const data = {repo: {stargazers_count: 5000, forks_count: 500, created_at: '2020-01-01', updated_at: new Date().toISOString(), pushed_at: new Date().toISOString()}, participation: {all: Array(52).fill(10)}}; const result = m.calculateAllMetrics(data); console.log('Overall status:', result.overall.status); console.log('Metrics:', Object.keys(result.metrics).length); process.exit(result.overall.status ? 0 : 1); }).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"

subtasks.notes: Module integration verified: calculateAllMetrics works with full repo data, all 6 metrics return correctly structured results, overall pulse aggregation works, constants exported properly. Full test suite passes (693 tests).

parallel_groups.reason: Both depend on phase-2-utilities, independent calculator implementations

acceptance_criteria: All 7 calculators return valid MetricResult objects
calculateAllMetrics wrapper returns complete pulse data
Edge cases handled gracefully (null, empty, partial data)
JSDoc documentation on all public functions
verification_strategy.reasoning: Medium risk calculation module requires comprehensive unit tests for all 7 metric calculators including edge cases. No security concerns as pure data transformation.
